title: Githyanki
content: ring Early Access, the Githyanki race used to feature +2 Strength and +1 Intelligence. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. Githyanki statistics and racial traits make them effective Warlocks, Eldritch Knights or Wizards (see Circlet of Intelligence for the two latter which allows you to dump Intelligence), given the bonuses and proficiencies they get.
